name: AESOpyn
0:
”Alexa, show the intercom.”
”Alexa, answer the intercom.”
”Alexa, hang up the intercom.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The AES Opyn skill allows you to control your Opyn intercom with your voice. To use the skill you must have the an AES Opyn account and an intercom connected to the internet.From there you will need to link your Amazon and Opyn accounts. Once this is done you can find your intercom by using the ""discover devices"" option in your Alexa app. 

Commands you can use for your Opyn intercom:
""Alexa, show {device name}.""
""Alexa, stop {device name}.""
""Alexa, unlock {lock name}.""
""Alexa, answer {device name}.""
""Alexa, hang up {device name}.""

When using the locks, you need set unlock code first, then control it by voice. Alexa will then ask you for the unlock code. (Example ""1234"")
